name: Faux_Real
description:
Faux_Real

This game was created as an assessable item for my Game Development Foundations course at AIE It demonstrates knowledge of basic Unity principles such as:

  • Scene Control
  • RayCasting
  • Unity Physics
  • Gameplay Mechanics
  • Implementing First Person Controls
  • User Interfaces and Menus

Skybox art is by "Stagit" from the Unity Asset Store. All other art is created by me.

Source: GitHub
